page.title: 13PUBLIC HOUSES,CAUNTON
page.content: The Plough Inn Parts of The Plough are 400 years old. The present tenant is J.A.Clarke.The pub belongs to a brewery,Marston Thompson.It is popular with both locals and outsiders. Opening hours; Mon_Thurs 10.30_14.30 18.30_22.30 (23.00 on Saturday) Sunday 12.00_14.00 19.00_22.00 The most popular time that people come in is lunch time and early evening.The most popular drink is lager. The Hole Arms The Hole Arms is 560 years old.The people who go are mostly outsiders.Most popular drinks are lager and bitter and the busiest days are from Thursday_Sunday.Opening hours; Monday_Friday 19.00_22.30 12.00_14.30 Wednesday 18.30_23.00 19.00_22.30.
